participant_1.background:
I was able to combine my passion for music and my career when I started my own indie band.
I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
I remember listening to Marduk with my friends in the basement.
my mom taught me how to play the cello.
I worked as a server at a restaurant before getting my current job.

participant_2.background:
I'm really into learning new things and expanding my knowledge.
i am a vegetarian.
I don't always see eye to eye with my dad, but we're still close.
My most valued possession is my dog, who has never failed to make me smile.
I play for fun, but I know I need to be more careful with my spending.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy learning new things, and I like to read.
That's great, I love to learn new things too! I play music in my spare time.
Oh wow! What kind of music?
I play in an indie band, and we play a variety of different genres.
That sounds awesome! Do you guys play live often?
Yeah, we try to play as often as we can.
That's great! I bet it's fun to get to perform your music for people.
It is, it's one of the best parts of being in a band.
I bet! I'm not sure if I'll ever have the guts to perform in front of people, but it sounds like a lot of fun.
It can be, but it's also really scary! It's definitely something that takes practice, but it's worth it when you get the chance to share your music with others.
Yeah, I can imagine! I'm glad you're able to do it, it sounds like you're really passionate about it.
Thanks! I am, it's a big part of my life.
That's great! I'm glad you have something you're passionate about.
